Caption: Mrs. Ujjal Singh presenting a student with a trophy
Description: According to the 1967 edition of Campastimes: “Sardarini Ujjal Singh distribute the year’s prizes for general proficiency in the various years and branches. The prize winners were given a big hand as they went up to receive their prizes.” Mr. Srinivasan (PTI) and Prof. S. Sampath are also seen.
